topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54dc449863687215a2b90a00#post_54dc449863687215a2b90a00
Some times a DM needs to be fucked with because he doesn't realize that he's being an asshole. I've been that DM before, and it took the party rebelling for me to realize, "shit I keep trying to rail road them into shit they've got no rational reason for doing."

In my defense I was 16 at the time.
